title: Bug 104630: Column icons not visible when connecting to Derby database
description: When connecting to a Derby database in the Available Items sector, the column icons do not show up as expected.
OB: When expanding the Data Source in the Available Items sector by clicking the related icon, the column icons do not appear.
EB: When expanding the Data Source in the Available Items sector by clicking the related icon, both table icons and column icons should show up.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the Available Items sector.
2. Expand the Data Source by clicking the related icon.
3. Observe that the column icons do not appear.
